snippet.title: Doctor Who: The Lonely Assassins - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The terrifying Weeping Angels are back with a vengeance. Solve the mystery before it's too late! Out now on iOS, Android and Steam. Find out more: https://www.doctorwhothelonelyassassins.com/ 

Buy now:
iOS: http://apple.co/38Nt4oN 
Android: http://bit.ly/3vsBNX3
Steam: http://bit.ly/3vuXm9v 

About the game:
Building on the terrifying legacy of the Weeping Angels, first encountered in the iconic story “Blink”, Doctor Who: The Lonely Assassins is a thrilling found-phone mystery developed by the award-winning creators of SIM and SIMULACRA.

Amidst a sinister series of events at a seemingly abandoned house in London, someone goes missing, and you find their phone. When it begins to self-destruct, ex-UNIT scientist Petronella Osgood enlists your help to uncover hidden clues and solve cryptic puzzles. Will you unravel the truth behind the chilling disappearance before it’s too late? But remember: don't turn your back, don't look away and DON’T BLINK.

For more Doctor Who games updates, subscribe to our channel and join the community:
https://twitter.com/Maze_Theory
https://www.facebook.com/MazeTheoryVR
https://www.instagram.com/maze_theory/
